name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anki Image Card Adder:沉浸式制作anki记忆卡片

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anki Image Occlusion is an immersive, low-cost and fast tool.The plug-in can quickly generate Anki flashcards.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1.Automatically identify knowledge points
This plug-in can automatically identify knowledge points in the content viewed in the browser. Simply by boxing the target area, it greatly saves users' time and effort.

2.Generate cards quickly
The plug-in can quickly generate Anki flashcards. Users only need to click on the plug-in icon and select the target area for memory point marking to easily create flashcards.

3.Multi-scenario support
This plug-in provides the option of generating cards with one click for specific fields such as programming languages, medicine, and law, making it easier for users to create cards.

4.Immersive learning experience
By turning knowledge points into cards, users can learn and memorize while browsing content, providing an immersive learning experience. This learning method not only improves learning efficiency, but also makes the learning process more interesting and easier.

5.Rich Knowledge Base
This plug-in has a powerful knowledge base function that can extract and organize knowledge points from various content in the browser and then convert them into Anki cards. Whether it is academic textbooks, professional documents, or online resources, efficient knowledge extraction can be achieved through plug-ins.

6.Low cost and high efficiency
Compared to the traditional way of making cards, this plug-in greatly saves users' time and effort. At the same time, the plug-in content supports multi-device synchronization, allowing users to learn and memorize anytime and anywhere. This convenience not only improves learning efficiency, but also reduces usage costs.
